plot outline: Watch the full movie, Thirunelliyile Penkutty online, only on Eros Now. Thirunelliyile Penkutty is a 2002 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Jayadevan and produced by Purushothaman. The film stars Naushad Mohe, Satheesh, Premkumar, Sindhu, Bhaskar, Maria, Shakkeela, Vinod, Reshma, Rajkumar in lead roles. The film had musical score by S.P.Bhoopathy.
